ingredients.ingredient: 1 Â½ pounds thin cut round steak
1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup
1 (10.5 ounce) can condensed French onion soup

cookingTips: Cut steak into serving-size pieces for even cooking and easier serving
Layer steak in slow cooker and pour soups over top without stirring initially
Cook on low for 6-8 hours until meat is fork-tender
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How do we ensure the round steak becomes tender and flavorful without drying out in the slow cooker?
